participant_1.background:
I grew up with my parents and siblings.
i keep my hair cut very short.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
i have recently started working as a freelance designer.
My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.

participant_2.background:
I'm not much of a cook, but I try my best.
I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
i love to dance salsa.
if i were to be reincarnated , i d want to come back as a hippopotamus.

content.text: I'm good! I just got back from a salsa dance class.
That sounds fun! I've always wanted to learn how to dance salsa.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to exercise.
I'll definitely look into it. What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel and I love to cook. I'm also a big fan of medical dramas and comedies.
I love to travel too! I've been to a few different countries, but I still have a lot of places I want to go.
Me too! I've been to a few countries in Europe, but I've always wanted to go to Asia.
Asia is beautiful! I've been to Thailand and Vietnam and I loved it.
Those are two places I've always wanted to go! What's your favorite thing about them?
I loved the culture and the food. The food is amazing!
I'm definitely going to have to try some Thai and Vietnamese food soon!
